cause.description:
School violence has rocked America for months now, alarming students, parents, and the American public. School violence, like all crime, is preventable though. We aim to develop school-violence prevention techniques and to teach students to employ them.
1. Regular people can prevent crime.
2. School violence, like all crime, is preventable.
cause.mission: To teach youth how to prevent school violence
cause.name: Prevent School Violence
